target.text: Setting Access Rights for the Submit State

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To set access rights for the Submit state:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: View the workflow-development page for the Time Off Request workflow, if you are not already viewing this page.

target.name: Step
target.text: View the workflow-development page for the Time Off Request workflow, if you are not already viewing this page.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Show whole workflow in the toolbar, which displays the flowchart in the working area.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Submit oval in the flowchart.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Set access rights for this state workflow tool:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Change State (group 1), located in the Access Rights column of the form, which selects it.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Selected users and groups option, as follows:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Find groups:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click View names starting withÉ, and click the letter M, as follows:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Managers in the Available box, and then click Add:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Apply in the bottom-left corner of the form.

target.name: Step
target.text: Back on the "Set access rights forÉ" page, click Apply:

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Setting Access Rights for the Review State

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To set access rights for the Review state:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Show whole workflow in the toolbar, which displays the flowchart in the working area.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Show whole workflow in the toolbar, which displays the flowchart in the working area.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Review oval in the flowchart.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Set access rights for this state link in the workflow tools.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Change State (group 1) access right, selecting it.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Select users and group option.

target.name: Step
target.text: If "Managers" is not already present in the Groups box, click the Find groups button, and select the "Managers" group.

target.name: Step
target.text: Back on the "Set access rights for all states" page, click Apply.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Set Access Control for More than One State

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To set access rights for more than one state:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click the Set access rights for all states workflow tool in the "Edit the whole workflow" menu.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click the Set access rights for all states workflow tool in the "Edit the whole workflow" menu.

target.name: Step
target.text: Ctrl+Click Approve and Record, highlighting both state names:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click View:

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Entry creator option:

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Selected users and groups option.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Find groups.

target.name: Step
target.text: Use the "Find groups" window to select "Managers" and "Human Resources."

target.name: Step
target.text: Back on the "Set access rights for all states" page, click Apply.
